description:
The waves are high today, so Bonobono goes wave riding alone. His keeps the upper half of his body out of the wave, which looks rather odd. When his friend Raccoon arrives, Bonobono invites him to try wave riding, but Raccoon complains that the sea will tire him out. Nevertheless, Raccoon gives it a try and slowly starts to enjoy it!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Sea Is a Place to Play Alone
Umi wa Hitori de Asobu Tokoro
海はひとりで遊ぶところ
